Subroutine runmodel

870 : 
871 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
872 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
873 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
874 : 
875 :       subroutine runmodel (invar, objfun)
876 :       use sce_mod
877 :       implicit none
878 : 
879 : !     * Declarations
880 :       REAL*8, DIMENSION(npar), INTENT(in) :: invar
881 :       REAL*8, INTENT(out) :: objfun
882 : 
883 : !     * Definitions
884 :       CHARACTER(1)   :: bestmark
885 :       CHARACTER(300) :: writeformat
886 : 
887 :       nrun = nrun + 1
888 :       call transpmodel(invar(:), npar, nrun, objfun, 1)
889 :       bestmark = ' '
890 :       if (objfun .gt. bestobj) then
891 :         bestmark = '+'
892 :       elseif (objfun .gt. bestincomp) then
893 :         bestmark = '.'
894 :       endif
895 :       if (evolution .ne. 'test') then
896 :         writeformat = '("Run",i6,"  (",a,"):",t28,"OF =",e12.6,1x,a)'
897 :         write(*,writeformat) nrun, trim(evolution), objfun, bestmark
898 :         write(kfile_progress,writeformat) nrun, trim(evolution), objfun, bestmark
899 :         write(kfile_sceout,outformat) invar(optid(:)), objfun
900 :         flush(kfile_progress)
901 :       endif
902 : 
903 :       return
904 :       end subroutine runmodel
